name: This Portfolio
description: Full-stack personal portfolio website built with React and TypeScript (frontend), Flask (backend), and Docker for containerized deployment.

name: NavigateCity.com
description: NavigateCity is a modern web app that helps travelers explore cities worldwide by offering detailed information on museums, restaurants, parks, landmarks, and local cuisine across various locations.

name: PASS Database System
description: Redesigned Hewitt Learning’s legacy PASS system into a modern full-stack platform. The app streamlines test ordering, score logging, and student data management—replacing the outdated Paradox-based workflow with secure APIs and a React frontend, significantly improving efficiency for educators.

name: Network Connected Chess Game
description: A multi-version chess engine project evolving from a 2021 local console game to a 2023 socket-based multiplayer system, and now into a 2025 web-based app with React frontend and C++ RESTful backend. Features include WebSocket support, modern UI, and scalable architecture.

name: JunggleWordMania
description: An educational multiplayer web game that helps students build vocabulary by unscrambling words. Built with Flask and HTML/CSS/JS, the platform features single and multiplayer modes, classroom game creation, leaderboards, and .csv-based word input for teachers.

name: Article Classification Program
description: A C++ program that classifies articles as News, Sports, or Culinary based on word frequency analysis. Trains on 30 articles per category and uses vector-based scoring while ignoring common words, punctuation, and case.
